actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the proceeds of obligations secured by installment notes be treated as payments on such notes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that for purposes of inclusion within gross income for a taxable year any proceeds of obligations secured by installment notes shall be treated as payments on such notes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the proceeds of obligations secured by installment notes be treated as payments on such notes.
